coupons.title: 25% Off Your Bill
coupons.description: Enjoy 25% off your entire bill at Texas Roadhouse this August!
coupons.terms: Valid on dine-in orders only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: VIP 15% Off
coupons.description: Texas Roadhouse VIP members get 15% off their entire bill this August.
coupons.terms: Valid for VIP members only. Show your VIP card or app at checkout. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Free Cactus Blossom
coupons.description: Get a free Cactus Blossom appetizer with any entree purchase.
coupons.terms: Valid for dine-in only. One free appetizer per table. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: 10% Off for Military
coupons.description: Show your military ID and get 10% off your entire bill.
coupons.terms: Valid for active and retired military personnel. Must show valid military ID. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Kids Eat Free
coupons.description: Kids eat free every Tuesday in August!
coupons.terms: Valid on Tuesdays only. Dine-in only. One free kids meal per adult entree purchased.

coupons.title: 50% off your first online order!
coupons.description: New to Texas Roadhouse online ordering? Enjoy 50% off your first order!
coupons.terms: First online order only. Minimum order value of $20 required. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Early Bird Special
coupons.description: Enjoy 20% off your bill when you dine in before 6pm.
coupons.terms: Valid Sunday-Thursday before 6pm. Dine-in only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Weekend Treat 10% Off
coupons.description: Enjoy 10% off your entire bill on weekends this August.
coupons.terms: Valid Friday-Sunday only. Dine-in only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

coupons.title: Free Dessert
coupons.description: Get a free dessert with purchase of two entrees.
coupons.terms: Valid for dine-in only.  One free dessert per table. Cannot be combined with other offers.
